entry.title: Pioneering an AI clinical copilot with Penda Health
entry.summary: OpenAI and Penda Health debut an AI clinical copilot that cuts diagnostic errors by 16% in real-world use—offering a new path for safe, effective AI in healthcare.

entry.title: Introducing ChatGPT agent
entry.summary: Introducing ChatGPT agent: it thinks and acts, using tools to complete tasks like research, bookings, and slideshows—all with your guidance.

entry.title: ChatGPT agent System Card
entry.summary: ChatGPT agent System Card: OpenAI’s agentic model unites research, browser automation, and code tools with safeguards under the Preparedness Framework.

entry.title: Toward understanding and preventing misalignment generalization
entry.summary: We study how training on incorrect responses can cause broader misalignment in language models and identify an internal feature driving this behavior—one that can be reversed with minimal fine-tuning.

entry.title: Addendum to OpenAI o3 and o4-mini system card: OpenAI o3 Operator
entry.summary: We are replacing the existing GPT-4o-based model for Operator with a version based on OpenAI o3. The API version will remain based on 4o.

entry.title: Introducing Codex
entry.summary: Introducing Codex: a cloud-based software engineering agent that can work on many tasks in parallel, powered by codex-1. With Codex, developers can simultaneously deploy multiple agents to independently handle coding tasks such as writing features, answering questions about your codebase, fixing bugs, and proposing pull requests for review.

entry.title: Addendum to o3 and o4-mini system card: Codex
entry.summary: Codex is a cloud-based coding agent. Codex is powered by codex-1, a version of OpenAI o3 optimized for software engineering. codex-1 was trained using reinforcement learning on real-world coding tasks in a variety of environments to generate code that closely mirrors human style and PR preferences, adheres precisely to instructions, and iteratively runs tests until passing results are achieved.

entry.title: Introducing HealthBench
entry.summary: HealthBench is a new evaluation benchmark for AI in healthcare which evaluates models in realistic scenarios. Built with input from 250+ physicians, it aims to provide a shared standard for model performance and safety in health.

entry.title: Introducing OpenAI o3 and o4-mini
entry.summary: Our smartest and most capable models to date with full tool access
